activities: Rev Worldwide Inc., and other companies within the Rev Worldwide Inc corporate group, may receive, hold and process personal data from users within the EU and EEA for different purposes depending upon the particular service or product being provided. These purposes include: Quality assurance of the received information, financial transactions processing, risk assessment, fraud prevention, AML monitoring scoring of users, loyalty program management and rewards redemption, sales and marketing to consumers, improvement of services and products, personalization of information and products, compliance with governmental, legislative and regulatory bodies, customer support, customer relationship management, background screening and processor on behalf of some of our customers.
eucountries: Austria, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Services - (CSV)Information Services - (INF)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)General Science & Technology - (GST)
